definition: don't blame the speaker, take note of his warning (idiom); an exhortation to speak one's mind without fear of reprisals, and with the expectation of being taken seriously
pinyin: yan2 zhe3 wu2 zui4 , wen2 zhe3 zu2 jie4

sentences.english: The court recorded a plea of not guilty.
sentences.chinese: 法院對無罪抗辯作了記載。

sentences.english: “Yes, but he was quickly exonerated,” Jessica replied.
sentences.chinese: 是的，但他很快就被定爲無罪。

sentences.english: Jesus was pure and sinless and holy.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌是純淨，無罪和聖潔的。

sentences.english: The jury brought in an acquittal .
The rule reflects how well the democracy goes in a country.
sentences.chinese: 無罪推定體現了一個國家法制民主文明化的程度。

sentences.english: He sent His sinless Son to bear the full brunt of the penalty we deserved to suffer.
sentences.chinese: 他差派他無罪的兒子承擔我們應該遭受的全部刑罰。

sentences.english: He was charged with murder but found innocent later.
sentences.chinese: 他被控殺人，但後來發現他是無罪的。

sentences.english: The accused declared himself to be innocent.
sentences.chinese: 被告聲明自己是無罪的。

sentences.english: I insist that he is innocent.
sentences.chinese: 我堅持認爲他是無罪的。

sentences.english: No punishment for doubtful case of crime is a reflection of substantial disposition in case of doctrine of the presumption of innocence.
sentences.chinese: 疑罪從無是無罪推定原則在案件的實體處理上的體現。

sentences.english: Marriage was instituted by God himself in the time of man's innocency and uprightness.
sentences.chinese: 婚姻是上帝在人無罪，聖潔公義的時候所設立的。

sentences.english: The jury found Gideon not guilty.
sentences.chinese: 陪審團認定吉迪恩無罪。

sentences.english: The lawyer claims that the accused was not guilty.
She put in a plea of guilty.
The whole Christian gospel of salvation was based upon a belief in a sinless sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 基督教福音是建立在一個無罪的羔羊的身上。
